content:
Configure General Support Settings for Service Cloud

Set up business hours and support holidays in Salesforce, and update case management settings to streamline your customer support processes.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: both Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience

Customize Support Settings
Support settings can help you automate case management. Choose email templates, default case owner, case notifications, and more.

Set Business Hours
Specify the hours when your support team is available to serve customers. This helps make your departmentâ€™s processes, such as escalations and milestones, more accurate.

Set Up Support Holidays
Holidays let you specify the dates and times your customer support team is unavailable. After you create a holiday, you can associate it with business hours to suspend business hours and escalation rules during holiday dates and times.

Add Service Cloud Channels
Design and Optimize the Service Agent Experience
title: Configuring General Support Settings for Salesforce
